LanguageData.CorruptChi.label: corrupt chi
LanguageData.CorruptChi.description: Throw a ball full of corrupt chi against a singular target. Very effective against boss-like entities.
LanguageData.CrowsLeap.label: crows leap
LanguageData.CrowsLeap.description: Leap through distant location, exuding crow feathers and dark energy during propultion.
LanguageData.CrowsLeap.verbProperties.label: gravity jump
LanguageData.DarkKnife.label: dark knife
LanguageData.DarkKnife.description: Throw a dangerously sharp knife against a singular distant enemy, inflicting armor bane upon impact.
LanguageData.DarkShuriken.label: dark shuriken
LanguageData.DarkShuriken.description: Throw a big shuriken that explodes upon impact, where it can take out groups of enemies and weakens them if they survived the blast.
LanguageData.DarkSpear.label: dark spear
LanguageData.DarkSpear.description: Throw a dangerously sharp spear against a singular distant enemy.
LanguageData.PhantomOfDeath.label: phantom of death
LanguageData.PhantomOfDeath.description: Shroud yourself with the essence of death, granting you a passive ability of inflicting instant death damage on melee hit.
LanguageData.ShadowCloak.label: shadow cloak
LanguageData.ShadowCloak.description: Render yourself invisible, while boosting your melee potential.
LanguageData.Shuriken.label: shuriken throw
LanguageData.Shuriken.description: Throw a dangerously sharp shuriken on a distant enemy.
LanguageData.Socialize.label: socialize
LanguageData.Socialize.description: Use your good looks and silver tongue to improve their opinion on you.
LanguageData.SummonAutomatons.label: summon automatons
LanguageData.SummonAutomatons.description: Summon automaton soldiers directly at the enemy to fight alongside you. Must be target at an enemy pawn.
LanguageData.SummonBallista.label: summon ballista
LanguageData.SummonBallista.description: Summon a ballista turret that can provide cover fire for you.
LanguageData.SummonDarkMine.label: summon dark mine
LanguageData.SummonDarkMine.description: Summon a dark mine rune in medium distance, which explodes when triggered.
LanguageData.SummonDecoy.label: summon decoy
LanguageData.SummonDecoy.description: Summon an annoying decoy that draws the aggro of multiple enemies, where upon destruction, the dummy will explode.
